questions.questionTitle: What is the relationship between the speakers?
What does the woman say about sick days?
anwers: They can be used as personal days.
They can be saved for the next year.
There is no pay for them.

questions.questionTitle: What does the man plan to do?

script:
� In addition to two weeks' paid vacation, we allow for six annual sick days, and one personal day off each year.
� Are the sick days "use them or lose them?"
� Yes. They do not carry over. You must use all six in one year. The same with the personal day. Any more questions I can answer?
� Not right now, but I might after I look through some of this material.
